segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, just holding out her hand like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even realizes how risky this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like it’s nothing, and she’s just trusting him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a little sad for her because she’s so small and doesn’t understand the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is right there, but she’s completely unaware of what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the girl doesn’t get in trouble if the mom suddenly notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so happy just waiting for that cookie, like it’s the best thing ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’d still be smiling if she knew how close her brother is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a mix of sweet and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR
